hero.title: Spin Your Feelings, Discover Your Rainbow Within
hero.subtitle: MoodWheel helps you understand, express, and manage emotions, making every feeling a resource for personal growth

wheel.title: Emotional Wheel Navigation
wheel.description: Explore your emotions layer by layer through an interactive wheel design, from basic feelings to subtle emotions, precisely locating your inner state

journal.title: Emotion Journal Recording
journal.description: Pair your emotions with text, photos, and voice recordings to document your current feelings and preserve valuable emotional trajectories

analysis.title: Emotion Pattern Analysis
analysis.description: View emotional change trends through timeline and calendar views to discover emotional triggers and patterns

toolkit.title: Emotion Regulation Toolkit
toolkit.description: Intelligently recommends meditation, music, expressive exercises, and other regulation methods based on your emotional state to help balance emotions

map.title: Mood Exploration Map
map.description: Gamify emotional exploration, unlock all emotions, and complete a journey of inner adventure

step1.title: Select Emotion
step1.description: Click on the emotion wheel to explore your current emotional state layer by layer

step2.title: Record Experience
step2.description: Rate emotional intensity, record text descriptions, photos, or voice

step3.title: Gain Insights
step3.description: View emotional change trends, discover emotional triggers

step4.title: Balance Emotions
step4.description: Use recommended emotion regulation tools to improve emotional management ability

appPreview.title: App Showcase
appPreview.description: Explore MoodWheel's core features and interface

user1.quote: MoodWheel helped me identify emotional nuances I never noticed before. Now I can better understand my reactions, and my family says my emotional management has improved significantly.
user1.name: Li Ming, Counselor

user2.quote: Using the emotion wheel daily to record feelings has become an important self-care ritual for me. I especially love the emotional exploration map design, which makes the whole process fun rather than a burden.
user2.name: Zhang Ting, College Student

user3.quote: As a corporate executive, I often feel immense pressure but can't articulate specific feelings. MoodWheel allows me to accurately express my inner state, and the methods provided in the emotion regulation toolkit are very practical.
user3.name: Wang Qiang, CEO

download.title: Begin Your Emotional Exploration Journey
download.description: Download MoodWheel, spin the emotion wheel, discover your inner rainbow
download.guarantee: 14-day unconditional refund guarantee, no hidden fees

seo.title: MoodWheel: Understand, Express & Manage Emotions | Emotional Wellness App
seo.description: Discover MoodWheel, the app that helps you explore your feelings with an interactive emotion wheel, journal, and analysis tools. Start your journey to emotional growth.
seo.keywords: emotion wheel, mood tracker, emotional intelligence, mental wellness, self-care, feeling journal, emotion management
